doc.title: Sister Dora
doc.plot: Dora dreams of marrying the son of a local canon, but her dreams of marrying him are dashed by her controlling father. To quell the pain, Dora throws herself into the life of the Sisterhood of the Good Samaritan. Many years later her passions are rekindled after an explosion at the local steel mill. Sister Dora is then torn between career and love.
